name: Acolyte
summary: Devout attendant capable of wielding minor divine magic.
description: Acolytes serve temples or shrines, using simple prayers and healing magic to aid their communities.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.text: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It prepares the cleric spell list: sacred flame, thaumaturgy; bless, cure wounds, sanctuary.

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

name: Bandit
summary: Street tough or road agent armed with simple weapons.
description: Bandits are desperate or opportunistic criminals who prey on the weak and unwary.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Brown Bear
summary: Massive bear that fights with tooth and claw.
description: Brown bears are powerful omnivores that defend their territory with fearsome strength.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

name: Cultist
summary: Fanatical devotee wielding ritual daggers and zeal.
description: Cultists hide dark agendas behind humble guises, gathering in secret to worship forbidden powers.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

name: Dire Wolf
summary: Enormous wolf that hunts in packs.
description: Dire wolves are fierce alpha predators with massive jaws and uncanny coordination.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Goblin
summary: Small skirmisher that relies on ambush tactics.
description: Goblins are opportunistic raiders who strike from the shadows and flee at the first sign of trouble.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Ogre
summary: Huge, brutal giant that smashes foes with heavy blows.
description: Ogres are dim-witted brutes that rely on raw strength and cruelty to overwhelm enemies.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

name: Skeleton
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
summary: Reanimated bones that march at a necromancer's command.
description: Skeletons are the animated remains of the dead, stripped of flesh and driven to obey dark wills.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Veteran
summary: Seasoned soldier trained for the front lines.
description: Veterans are hardened warriors who have survived years of conflict and honed their tactics.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Wolf
summary: Pack hunter with keen senses and vicious bite.
description: Wolves rely on cooperation and speed, harrying prey with relentless attacks.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Young Black Dragon
summary: Sinister swamp dragon that spews acid breath.
description: Young black dragons revel in decay and shadow, ruling fetid marshes with cruel cunning.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5â€“6)
actions.text: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
summary: Shambling corpse that refuses to stay down.
description: Zombies are corpses infused with necromantic magic, driven to obey the commands of their creators.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
